title: WATCH:  Rainwater leaks onto Las Vegas casino floor
description: Casino patrons were flooded with more than just chips when rainwater poured in through the roof amid flash flooding in Las Vegas

title: WEB - LINK - BREAKING NEWS LIVE BLOG
Former death row inmate in Mississippi to be resentenced
description: A former death row inmate in Mississippi will be resentenced a second time because of a determination that he has intellectual disabilities

title: WATCH:  Watch this pilot thank his flight attendant mom during their 1st flight together
description: "She's been one of the biggest supporters in my career of becoming a pilot ever since my very first flight lesson," Cole Doss, a United Airlines pilot, said in the sweet video.

title: GOP 2024 hopefuls questioned on Trump ahead of his jail surrender
description: With a show of hands, most Republican presidential hopefuls indicated they would back Donald Trump even if he's a convicted criminal.

title: Board approves accreditation of Tulsa Public Schools after superintendent resigns
description: The Oklahoma state school board voted unanimously to accredit Tulsa Public Schools amid fears that the largest school district in the state could have lost its status.

title: Police believe they have found body of missing 2-year-old at trash facility
description: Police believe they may have found the body of 2-year-old J'Asiah Mitchell in a Georgia garbage facility. Police say his father is a suspect in the investigation.

title: SpaceX sued by Justice Department over alleged asylee, refugee discrimination
description: The Department of Justice is suing Elon Musk's SpaceX for allegedly rejecting job applicants over their asylum or refugee status.

title: Jim Jordan launches probe of Georgia prosecutor Fani Willis ahead of Trump surrender
description: The same day former President Donald Trump is set to surrender at Fulton County jail, House Judiciary Chairman Jim Jordan launched a probe into the Georgia prosecution.

title: Wild monkey spotted running rampant through neighborhoods as police warn to stay away
description: Police in Florida have issued a warning about a wild monkey on the loose and told residents to steer clear of the animal if they encounter it.

title: A word missing from the Republican presidential debate: 'Recession'
description: The Republican presidential candidates discussed other economic issues like inflation and U.S. debt.

title: Heavy rain floods Ohio, Las Vegas streets, Detroit airport tunnel
description: Heavy rain has flooded an Ohio highway where people were rescued from their cars, covered the Las Vegas strip with water and closed a busy airport terminal outside Detroit

title: T-Mobile will lay off 5,000 employees in the coming weeks
description: Wireless carrier T-Mobile plans to cut 5,000 jobs, or about 7% of its workforce

title: Boyfriend arrested in murder of missing North Carolina woman
description: Authorities said they believe they've found the remains of a 39-year-old Allisha Watts, a North Carolina woman who has been missing for over a month.

title: WATCH:  Animals at London Zoo have annual weigh-in
description: Some 14,000 animals at the London Zoo,  from penguins to tigers, lined up for their annual weigh-ins and the results will go into a database to be shared with zoos around the world.

title: Putin breaks silence on Prigozhin plane crash as bodies taken to medical examiner
description: The Russian president's comments were made hours after the bodies of the crash victims were moved to the Tver Regional Bureau of Forensic Medical Examination.

title: Los Angeles Lakers to unveil Kobe Bryant statue outside their arena on Feb. 8
description: The Los Angeles Lakers will unveil a statue of Kobe Bryant outside their downtown arena on Feb. 8

title: WATCH:  Family films encounter with great white shark
description: A family captured an incredible encounter with a great white shark off Australia's Sunshine Coast.

title: India's lunar rover comes down a ramp to the moon's surface and takes a walk
description: Indian space officials say that a lunar rover has descended down a ramp from the lander of India’s spacecraft that has made its much celebrated touch-down near the moon’s south pole

title: Uber raises minimum age for most Calif. drivers to 25 due to insurance costs
description: Uber has raised the minimum age requirement for most new drivers in California to 25

title: Saudi Arabia, Iran and Egypt among 6 countries joining BRICS in 2024
description: The five-nation BRICS group announced expansion of members on Thursday, having invited six countries to join the bloc.

title: Sandwich chain Subway will be sold to Arby's owner Roark Capital
description: Sandwich chain Subway said Thursday it will be sold to the private equity firm Roark Capital

title: Iran, Saudi Arabia, Egypt among 6 nations set to join China, Russia in BRICS bloc
description: Iran and Saudi Arabia are among six nations that have been invited to join the BRICS bloc of developing economies

title: Fewer Americans apply for jobless benefits as labor market keeps humming along
description: Applications for unemployment benefits fell again last week as America’s labor market continues to hum along despite attempts by the Federal Reserve to cool the economy and bring down inflation that’s still higher than optimal

title: Major wildfires sweeping through forests in Greece force evacuations
description: Firefighters are struggling against strong winds and hot, dry conditions to tame multiple wildfires that for days have burned forests and homes in northeastern Greece and on the fringes of the country’s capital

title: North Korea fails 2nd attempt to launch spy satellite but vows to try again
description: North Korea said a second attempt to put a spy satellite into orbit failed early Thursday.

title: FIFA opens case against Spanish soccer president for conduct at Women's World Cup
description: FIFA has opened a disciplinary case against Spanish soccer president Luis Rubiales for his behavior at the Women’s World Cup final

title: WATCH:  Fire whirl forms over Canadian lake
description: Dramatic footage shows fire whirl spinning over a lake during an out-of-control wildfire in British Columbia.

title: Woman pleads guilty to fatally shoving 87-year-old grandmother
description: Lauren Pazienza pleaded guilty in court on Wednesday to fatally pushing 87-year-old Barbara Gustern on a New York City street last year.

title: Father killed confronting scooter thieves with his son in their own backyard: Police
description: A father has been shot and killed after an early morning confrontation with scooter thieves in their own backyard, police say.

title: Japan begins releasing treated Fukushima water into Pacific
description: Executives of the company, known as TECPCO, told reporters they would immediately halt the release of the treated water into the Pacific if any issues were detected.

title: WSJ reporter arrives at Moscow court for detention hearing
description: The FSB filed a request to extend the journalist's detention, a WSJ editor said.

title: 7 takeaways from the 1st GOP primary debate
description: Eight GOP presidential candidates gathered for the primary debate of the 2024 cycle, offering voters a chance to start deciding who would be the party's standard bearer.

title: Fact-checking the first GOP debate: Roundup from PolitiFact
description: ABC News' roundup of PolitiFact's fact-checking from the first Republican debate in Milwaukee on Wednesday.

title: Trump's absence didn't dominate debate, but it showed his lasting influence: ANALYSIS
description: The first Republican debate of the 2024 cycle --which Trump declined to participate -- showcased both the challenges to the GOP’s identity and future path

title: 4 arrested in kidnapping of newborn twins
description: Michigan police have arrested four people in connection with the kidnapping of newborn twins Montana and Matthew Bridges who were taken when they were only 14 days old.

title: Memorable moments from political debates past
description: Debates "provide opportunities for candidates to either help themselves or hurt themselves," one expert said.

title: Trump to Tucker Carlson: Other GOP candidates shouldn't run for president
description: The pre-taped interview between former President Donald Trump and former Fox News host Tucker Carlson was released on X.

title: Reggie Bush sues NCAA over suggestion he was part of 'pay-for-play' plan
description: Former football star Reggie Bush announced he’s suing the NCAA, claiming the organization’s past statement suggesting he had a “pay-for-play” arrangement was defamatory.

title: At least 9 shot in bar in Orange County, California, authorities say
description: At least nine people were shot Wednesday night in the Trabuco Canyon area of Orange County, a representative for the Orange County Sheriff’s Office confirmed.

title: Tensions high in San Francisco as city seeks reversal of ban on clearing homeless encampments
description: Tensions flared as lawyers for San Francisco argued before an appeals court to lift an injunction prohibiting the city from clearing homeless tent encampments

title: What’s going on with Scooter Braun’s artist roster? Here’s what we know and what’s still speculation
description: Scooter Braun is one of the most recognizable names in the music business for his singular work as an executive and entrepreneur

title: Oil production boosts government income in New Mexico, as legislators build savings 'bridge'
description: Record-breaking oil production in New Mexico is likely to provide state government with a new multibillion-dollar surplus during the upcoming budget year

title: Rail union wants new rules to improve conductor training in the wake of 2 trainee deaths
description: The nation's largest railroad union wants federal regulators to do more to ensure conductors are properly trained in the wake of two recent trainee deaths in Maryland

title: Police detective shot in western Washington, police say
description: Police say a detective in Washington state was shot

title: Man convicted of killing Kristin Smart is attacked in prison and hospitalized in serious condition
description: The man convicted of killing a college student who vanished from a California campus more than 25 years ago has been hospitalized after he was attacked in prison

title: WATCH:  Vehicle crashes into Arizona beauty salon
description: No serious injuries were reported after authorities say a 90-year-old motorist crashed her vehicle into an Arizona beauty salon.

title: WATCH:  Rescued puma cubs find new home at Philadelphia Zoo
description: Two rescued puma cubs, whose mother is believed to have been shot by a farmer in Washington state, have found a new home at the Philadelphia Zoo.
